title: Skin idea for Lulu (and pix)
body:
Cosplay Lulu

Lulu is dressed up like *Annie*, and Pix is dressed up like *Tibbers*.


Just thinking of 6 impossible things before lunch
Bump if you like this idea

replies.body: I have a better idea. Why don't we just give Frostfire Annie a giant Poro.
Id pay for reverse lulu, you control a giant pix and lulu flies around her head

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=ZXl3pBtZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-16T00:48:43.601+0000)
> Id pay for reverse lulu, you control a giant pix and lulu flies around her head

Reverse Sejuani would be better!
